comment: Sounds to me like BBC gardening again. They love putting plants among their audiences to create the agendas they want to promote and of course the extreme left wing paper, The Daily Mirror, loves to help them out.
amr:
# ::snt Sounds to me like BBC gardening again. They love putting plants among their audiences to create the agendas they want to promote and of course the extreme left wing paper, The Daily Mirror, loves to help them out.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / sound-01
            :ARG1 (g / garden-01
                  :ARG0 (p / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "BBC"))
                  :mod (a / again))
            :ARG2 (ii / i))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 (t / they)
                  :ARG1 (p2 / put-01
                        :ARG0 t
                        :ARG1 (p3 / plant)
                        :ARG2 (a3 / audience
                              :poss t)
                        :purpose (c / create-01
                              :ARG0 t
                              :ARG1 (a4 / agenda
                                    :ARG1-of (p4 / promote-02
                                          :ARG0 t
                                          :ARG1-of (w / want-01
                                                :ARG0 t))))))
            :op2 (l2 / love-01
                  :ARG0 (p5 / paper
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "The"
                              :op2 "Daily"
                              :op3 "Mirror")
                        :ARG1-of (l3 / left-19
                              :degree (e / extreme))
                        :mod (o / of-course))
                  :ARG1 (h / help-out-03
                        :ARG0 p5
                        :ARG2 t))))

comment: The whole continent is incredibly racist against Gypsies compared to Americans' attitude about any race.
